era5land_get[source]

era5land_get(region, save_path, variables=['10m_u_component_of_wind', '10m_v_component_of_wind', '2m_dewpoint_temperature', '2m_temperature', 'surface_pressure', 'total_precipitation'], product='reanalysis-era5-land', max_workers=8)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Example of use 

region = RegionST('PT', [-10, 36, -6, 42], None, '2010-01-01', '2010-01-31', 'H')
era5land_get(region, Path('ERA5'))
